data.actual_result: It does vanish before completion of it's uptime.
data.expected_result: The information menu thing doesn't vanish.
data.short_description: Everytime you speak speak in a voice channel/DM/GDM while having the information menu up, the toast vanishes before completion of it's uptime.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel. - Long press on the 3 dots overflow menu. - Speak.
